body: Hello all,{newline}{newline}We have prepared our manuscript {manuscript_title} for review by coauthors.{newline}{newline}Please could you add any comments as tracked changes in the document here:{newline}{newline}{manuscript_link}{newline}{newline}Also, could you please complete this review by {review_deadline}?{newline}{newline}Thank you to everyone for your contributions to this research. Please send me a message if you have any questions.{newline}{newline}All the best,{newline}Hamish
